argument.name: XPos
argument.description: The horizontal coordinate of the point to draw to.

argument.name: YPos
argument.description: The vertical coordinate of the point to draw to.

page.discussion: LINETO() draws a line from the current position to the specified point. LINETO() must be preceded with a function that sets a location, such as START_POLY(). Limitations: Used only in the Code sections of UI_BITMAP_DRAW(), UI_SCREEN_DRAW(), and UI_PRINTER_DRAW().

section.example: ui_bitmap_create("test",4,4) ui_bitmap_draw("test",<<%code% inner_Rect(0,0,4,4) start_poly(2,1) lineto(3,2) lineto(1,3) poly(2,1) %code%) ui_dlg_box("","{image=test}")
